name: High-Tech Defense Systems
description: Advanced surveillance and automated defense systems reduce infiltration success.

name: Hidden Bunkers
description: Leaders hide underground, making psychic domination harder.

name: Elite Military Forces
description: Highly trained forces efficiently suppress cultist uprisings.

name: Machine Legions
description: Autonomous drones patrol the skies and cities tirelessly.

name: Total Media Control
description: Censors any foreign ideologies, delaying indoctrination.

name: Propaganda Masters
description: Sophisticated propaganda machines counteract external influences.

name: Cybersecurity Elite
description: Unbreakable firewalls and counter-hackers protect vital infrastructure.

name: Bio-Defense Laboratories
description: Advanced labs develop antibodies against biological threats.

name: Weather Control Systems
description: Storm generation systems interfere with aerial cultist approaches.

name: Religious Control
description: Religious control belief systems resist foreign cult influences.

name: Mind Shield Training
description: Elite agents trained to resist mental invasions.

name: Economic Sanctions
description: Weakens cultist supplies by cutting off critical resources.

name: Firewall Fortresses
description: Massive data fortresses make hacking attempts futile.

name: Heroic Order
description: Legendary defenders stand as the last bulwark against evil.

name: Population Resilience
description: High morale makes indoctrination slow and difficult.

name: Information Blackout
description: Total control over internet and external information sources.

name: Psychological Warfare Experts
description: Master manipulators reverse cultist propaganda.

name: Climate Barriers
description: Extreme environments make invasion nearly impossible.

name: Ancient Guardians
description: Mythic warriors from ancient orders protect key sites.

name: Underground Resistance
description: Hidden civilian groups ready to fight back against indoctrination.

name: Drone Sentinels
description: Swarming surveillance drones constantly monitor urban centers.

name: Quantum Encryption
description: Unbreakable codes protect state secrets and strategic plans.

name: Hydraulic Barriers
description: Flood barriers protect against aquatic monstrosities.

name: Mass Vaccination Programs
description: Prevents biological corruption by inoculating the population.

name: Hyper-Alliance Pact
description: Nations unite under a shared defense agreement.

name: Advanced Psychology Units
description: Analyzes and counters mental warfare strategies.

name: Magnetic Storm Project
description: Generates magnetic pulses that disable cultist tech.

name: Underground Sanctuaries
description: Entire cities operate beneath the surface as safe zones.

name: Social Credit System
description: Absolute control over civilian behavior via rewards and punishment.

name: Psy Resonators
description: Emit frequencies that suppress psychic interference.
